text:
@RobertTGarrett 'On Friday, four conservative GOP state representatives skewered Abbott over the mask issue, saying in a letter that the coronavirus affects “only a subset” of Texans.'

Hmm.  And yesterday, Ron DeSantis blamed FL spike on 'overwhelmingly Hispanic' workers.
